title: Sub Zer0 The Digital Assassin
body:
(P) Hunter: Every 5th time Sub Zer0 Kills an enemy minon he gains 2/4/6/8/10/12/14/16/18 bonus gold
(Q) QuadCore!: Passive every 5th ATTACK sub zer0 deals 10% AD as Ap bonus damage to his target. Sub Zeros shot is spilt into 2/4 shots, the first shot deals 100 % AD damage  his 1/3 other shots deal 5/10/15/25% AD damage, if there isn't 1/3 other targets all the shots will hit the first target Costs: 50 Energy  20/15/10/5 Seconds
(W) Lagggg: Sub Zer0 teleports forward within 500 range Costs: 100 Energy 30/25/20/15 Seconds
(E)  Hard Coding:  Sub Zer0 Gains 20/30/40/50 Armour for 5 Seconds costs 50 Energy 25/20/15/10 Seconds
(R) Assassins Mark: Sub Zero Gains 1.5 ATTACK Speed and 50% Damage for 15/30/45 Seconds Costs 150/125/100 Energy 120/90/60 Seconds


Stats
Health: 600/25
Energy: 200/0
Health Regen: 2.3
Energy Regen: 5
AD: 60/6
Ap:0/0
Armour: 50
Magic Resist: 40
ATTACK Speed: 0.9
Attack Range: 500

Resource Bar
 Sub Zer0 Runs on energy


Lore
 Sub Zer0 was one of dj sonas  tracks  that got currpt, on a quest to get his cure, he journeys to  the league of justice to find Heimidinger...

Please someone work on the lore for me 
Sub zero is designed for jungling/ Adc

Quotes
Taunts
"Programs Have Goals Guess mine."
"Magic Users Beat this."
Moving
"Let us go."
"They will be useless"
Attacking
"The will fear me."
"Assassins Have a Mark."
"What's the bounty on this one?"

replies.body:
Do not create new resources. I cannot remember ever seeing someone create a new use for the resource bar that was worth the addition.

In this case, your solution is easy: make him an Energy based champion with 200 energy/10 energy regen per second. "Energy" even fits the computer/AI theme.

ah yeah, he seems pretty good though, just need to smooth out the wording and I would get a better grip on what you are trying to say. also; sub zero Is a character name used in about 10+ games of mortal kombat, i'm not sure if they could but they might try to sue if league did that
Yeh I'm thinking of new names,
not sure if a joke or really badly put together
Probs bad put together, did on ipad soooo
Not really the idea but an adc/ Jungle, on the only thing league hasn't done, made a tech based champ
